motions.title: Consent Agenda Approval
motions.description: Approval of April 14, 2025 meeting minutes and consideration of additional services to be rendered by TSW for Direction Dunwoody Comprehensive Plan.

motions.title: Contract Amendment for Final Design Winters Chapel Path Phase 2
motions.description: Approval of contract amendment with Practical Design Partners for final design in amount not to exceed $782,094.11.

motions.title: Project Framework Agreement with Georgia Department of Transportation
motions.description: Approval of project framework agreement with GDOT for Winters Chapel Path Phase 2 to receive federal funding for design.

motions.title: Funding Authorization for Path between Eidson Road and Cherry Hill Lane
motions.description: Award contract to Hasbun Construction, LLC in amount of $216,436 plus 10% contingency to construct 10-foot wide shared-use path.

motions.title: Guaranteed Maximum Price Contract for Brook Run Park Maintenance Facility
motions.description: Approval of guaranteed maximum price contract with Moeller Purcell to construct new maintenance facility at Brook Run Park in amount of $3,787,000 including $335,000 contingency.

motions.title: Renewal of Property & Liability Insurance with GIRMA
motions.description: Approval of property and liability insurance renewal with GIRMA in amount of $757,019 (8.4% increase from 2024).

motions.title: 6-month Trial Agreement with Flock Safety
motions.description: Approval of 6-month trial agreement with Flock Safety in amount of $100,000 with opt-out policy included in contract.

motions.title: HB92 Option 2 - Non-certification of Estimated Roll-back Rate
motions.description: Approval of Option 2 to take no action (non-certification of an estimated roll-back rate) as most transparent approach.

motions.title: Motion to Enter Executive Session
motions.description: Motion to enter executive session for legal and personnel discussion.
